title: Russian Band Pompeya Finds Safety In English-Language Lyrics
teaser: Yes there are other bands from Russia besides Pussy Riot. NPR's Scott Simon speaks with Daniil Brod, lead singer for Pompeya, who says they wanted to create music that's sunny, light and fun.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
